parameters: Okay,\. Deb. Arts building it is.\.\.
I got a lead yesterday.\.\. Apparently, my philosophy professor has a dog just like the one who stole my papers.\.\. Problem is that I have no clue where he is.
I emailed him, tried to contact the department, everything is a no-go.
You sound scary when you're pumped.
I need to get to the Biological Sciences building.
